function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases through the completion of questionnaires and surveys","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases among participants and researchers","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for handling physical questionnaires and surveys, and encourage online completion where possible","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, digital questionnaires, electronic data collection tools","People":"Participants, researchers, data collectors","Owner":"Researchers, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Non-compliance with data protection laws and ethical standards","Impact":"Legal consequences, breach of privacy, and damage to reputation","Mitigation":"Ensure compliance with national and EU data protection laws, ethical standards, and obtain approval from ethics committees","Technologies":"Secure data storage, encryption, anonymization techniques","People":"Participants, researchers, ethics committee members","Owner":"Researchers, ethics committee"}]}
